title: Can I Hide Mutual Friends on Facebook? Explained + Workaround

steps.title: Open Facebook on your Android.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your Android. It’s the blue icon with a white “f” inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer. Even when you set your friends list to Only Me, your friends will still be able to see your mutual friends. The only way mutual friends will not be displayed is if your friends also hide their friends lists.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. This displays the menu.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings and Privacy.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings and Privacy . It's about halfway down the menu next to an icon that resembles a gear. This expands the "Settings & Privacy" menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's the first option below "Settings & Privacy." It's next to an icon that resembles a person.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap How people find and contact you.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap How people find and contact you . It's the third option below the "Audience and visibility" header. It's next to an icon that resembles a person with a magnifying glass next to their head.

steps.title: Tap Who can see your friends list?.
steps.content: Tap Who can see your friends list? . It's the second option below the "Your friends" header at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Only me.
steps.content: Tap Only me . This hides your friends list from everyone on Facebook. Alternatively, you can select "Close friends" to only share your friend's list with those who are marked as close friends, or "Specific friends" to select a group of friends to share your friend's list. You can also select "Friends except" to exclude specific friends from seeing your friend's list.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This saves your preferred settings and restricts who can see your friends list. However, at this point, your Facebook friends can still see which friends you have in common.

steps.title: Ask your friends to restrict who can view their friends list to “Only me.”
steps.content: Ask your friends to restrict who can view their friends list to “Only me.” Once your Facebook friends have made this same change to their settings, they won’t be able to see your mutual friends. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Mutual friends are friends that you have in common with the person viewing your profile.
steps.content: Mutual friends are friends that you have in common with the person viewing your profile. For example, both you and Sally are Facebook friends with John. When Sally visits your Facebook profile, John will appear as a mutual friend. Even if you have hidden your friends list, John will still appear as a mutual friend to Sally. So if you and John set your friends lists to "Only Me," Sally will not see any mutual friends when she visits your page.

steps.title: Can you hide your mutual friends from everyone?
steps.content: Can you hide your mutual friends from everyone? You cannot hide your mutual friends list easily. You'll need to ask your friends to set their lists to "Only Me" as well to hide your mutual friends on Facebook. Fortunately, changing the privacy of these lists is easy to do on Android , your computer, and iPhone/iPad. You can also easily hide the overall number of friends you have on Facebook using an Android .

steps.title: Can you turn off mutual friends on Facebook Dating?
steps.content: Can you turn off mutual friends on Facebook Dating? If you don't want to see friends of friends suggested as potential matches on Facebook Dating, you can turn this feature off. Here's how: In the Facebook app, tap the three-line menu and select Dating . Tap the profile icon at the top-right. Tap Settings . Scroll down and tap Privacy Settings . Toggle the "Suggest friends of friends" switch to the off position. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Can I hide one friend on Facebook from others?
steps.content: Can I hide one friend on Facebook from others? Unfortunately, you cannot hide your friendship with a specific friend. You can only hide your entire friends list (which will still display mutuals).

steps.title: Why can't I see all of someone's friends on Facebook?
steps.content: Why can't I see all of someone's friends on Facebook? If you're only seeing mutual friends when you visit someone's profile, they have changed the privacy of their friends list. They may have set the privacy to "Only me," or they may only be allowing certain friends or friend groups to see their entire friends list.
